titleStmt.title: Good advice to the Church of England, Roman Catholick and Protestant dissenter, in which it is endeavoured to be made appear that it is their duty, principle & interest to abolish the penal laws and tests
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold, by Andrew Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in Huntington Library (reel 818) and Harvard University Library (reel 2011).
Attributed to William Penn. cf. BM.
